channel.title: Working on a newsletter reader app, looking for feedback
channel.description:
Hi, I'm Thang, a developer from Vietnam. I am working on a newsletter reader app (it only a web app for now) name Newsletterest
Newsletterest app helps you discover, subscribe, and consume great content all in one place. Get those newsletters out of your inbox and onto your Newsletterest.
You can find it at newsletterest.com
I'd love to hear what you think!
